Hello, and welcome to our course on Employee Engagement and Employee Relations. I’m excited to have you with us as we dive into two of the most essential aspects of modern workplace dynamics.

In this course, we’ll explore the Importance of Employee Relations in the Workplace—a crucial element for fostering a cohesive and productive work environment. Strong employee relations not only promote trust and communication but also serve as the foundation for long-term organizational success.

We’ll also discuss the Role of HR in Managing Employee Relations. Human Resources plays a pivotal role in maintaining positive relationships between employees and management. We'll examine best practices, policies, and frameworks that HR professionals use to create a healthy, collaborative workplace.

Next, we’ll cover Employee Engagement—a key factor that directly influences organizational performance. We’ll explore how increased engagement leads to better productivity, innovation, and overall business outcomes.

To further support your understanding, we’ll look at Tools and Techniques for Measuring Employee Engagement. Knowing how to assess engagement levels is essential for identifying both strengths and areas for improvement. Moreover, we’ll examine Strategies for Enhancing Employee Engagement, offering practical insights and approaches to inspire commitment, enthusiasm, and motivation within your workforce.

Finally, we’ll focus on Building a Positive Work Environment, which is vital for nurturing employee satisfaction, reducing turnover, and fostering long-term loyalty.

By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge and tools to strengthen employee relations, boost engagement, and drive your organization’s success. Let’s begin and transform the way you approach employee engagement and relations!


Discussing employee relations and employee engagement together in one online course makes sense because both concepts are deeply interconnected and play a crucial role in creating a positive work environment and driving organizational success. Here's why it’s beneficial to cover both topics in a single course:


1. Interconnectedness of Concepts:

Employee Relations focuses on the relationship between employers and employees, encompassing everything from conflict resolution and communication to fair treatment and legal compliance. Strong employee relations are the foundation for a positive work environment where employees feel respected and valued.

Employee Engagement is about how emotionally invested and motivated employees are in their work and the organization. High levels of engagement are often the result of effective employee relations. When employees feel that their concerns are addressed, their contributions are recognized, and they are treated fairly, they are more likely to be engaged.


2. Holistic Approach to HR Management:

Combining employee relations and engagement in one course allows for a more comprehensive understanding of how to manage and motivate employees. It enables HR professionals to see the bigger picture of how managing relationships directly impacts engagement levels, and how engaged employees contribute to better employee relations.


3. Strategies for Improvement:

Discussing both topics together allows for the exploration of strategies that improve both employee relations and engagement simultaneously. For example, open communication channels and conflict resolution mechanisms can enhance both relations and engagement. Recognizing and rewarding employees also strengthens both areas.


4. Efficiency in Learning:

Since both employee relations and engagement involve overlapping areas of HR practice, addressing them in a single course makes learning more efficient. HR professionals can gain insights into how improving one area can positively impact the other, leading to a more integrated approach to workforce management.


5. Practical Application:

A combined course can provide practical tools and frameworks that address both employee relations and engagement. For example, a module on conflict resolution might not only teach how to resolve disputes but also how to turn those resolutions into opportunities for increasing employee engagement.


6. Organizational Culture and Performance:

The course can help participants understand how both employee relations and engagement contribute to building a positive organizational culture. A strong culture, in turn, enhances performance, reduces turnover, and makes the organization a more attractive place to work.


In summary, discussing employee relations and employee engagement together in one online course provides a more complete understanding of how to create a positive, productive, and motivated workforce. By learning about both areas in tandem, HR professionals can develop strategies that support a healthy work environment and drive organizational success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Human Resources or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Accredited Diploma in Mathematics for K-6 to K-12
courseDetails.shortDescription: Everyday Math | Arithmetic, Numbers, Decimal | Percentage, Ratio, Proportion | Power, Exponent, Roots | Factor, Patterns
courseDetails.longDescription:
Interested in Mathematics? Do you need extra help to build a solid math foundation before pursuing higher education in mathematics?

Our course is specifically designed for school and college students. This course will help you build a solid mathematical foundation for all your academic endeavours.

This Math Course explores how various number systems, such as binary and decimal, impact our digital world. You'll also learn how to compare entire numbers precisely and simply using the equal to (=), less than (<), and greater than (>) symbols for efficient mathematical comparisons.

In this basic math course, you'll master how to use percentages to uncover original amounts and efficiently calculate everything from sale discounts to tax obligations. Additionally, we'll demystify the concepts of PEMDAS and BODMAS, guiding you through precise calculation techniques step-by-step. Gain the confidence to handle complex mathematical operations with ease.

Moreover, you'll explore the critical math role of precise ratios in baking and cooking, ensuring consistently outstanding results in every dish. As we delve into the power of word formulations in daily life, you'll discover why metric measurements are key to success, whether you're in the lab or the kitchen. Learn how the SI system represents the universal language of measurement, equipping you with the tools for accuracy in every endeavour.

By learning the math formulae for calculating the area and perimeter of polygons with four sides, you will be able to utilise their practical applications in a variety of fields and appreciate their adaptability. As you learn about the world of three-dimensional forms and three-dimensional quadrilaterals, you will be able to calculate surface area and volume for real-world uses.

Additionally, this math course will illustrate the significance of powers of ten and the unique role of zero as an exponent. It will provide you with a foundational understanding crucial for solving problems in science and mathematics. You'll also learn how to determine the lowest common multiple swiftly. This is a key skill for simplifying fractions and tackling various mathematical challenges.


Enrol in our Foundation Diploma in Mathematics and embark on a journey of mathematical discovery. From arithmetic operations to geometric principles and real-world applications, this course equips you with indispensable skills for academic and professional success.


This course comes with the following Sections:

  1. Foundations of Numbers: Delve into the basics of math by exploring various number systems, including whole numbers, fractions, and negatives. This section emphasizes practical arithmetic applications to strengthen your foundational math skills.

  2. Arithmetic Operations: Master core math operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. You'll focus on real-world applications, the order of operations, and improving calculator skills to enhance your math fluency.

  3. Decimals: Learn about the fundamentals of decimals, their power in approximation, and how math involving decimal division is crucial for accurate calculations in many real-world scenarios.

  4. Percentages: This section unveils the power of math ratios, the versatility of fractions, and the difference between percentages and points. You'll also analyze stock market trends to make wiser financial decisions.

  5. Ratios and Proportions: Understand the essence of math ratios in both part-to-part and part-to-whole comparisons. Calculate math formulas to determine ingredient proportions or measure lengths for everyday tasks.

  6. Measurements - Part 1: Learn about metric measurements and refine your estimates with math using reference objects. Gain fluency in the universal language of measurement by understanding the math principles behind the SI system.

  7. Measurements - Part 2: Discover how temperature impacts weather, cooking, and other activities in this math section on capacity and volume. You will also refine math skills for measuring length accurately in day-to-day tasks.

  8. Basic Geometry: Part 1: Explore the complexity of shapes and foundational math concepts like triangles, polygons, circumference, and radius. This part lays the groundwork for grasping geometric math ideas.

  9. Basic Geometry: Part 2: Study 3D math shapes, investigate cylinders, and examine the dimensions of irregular shapes in this math section on advanced geometry for practical applications.

  10. Powers and Exponents: Explore exponents' real-world math applications, investigate powers of ten, practice advanced math operations, and understand the significance of zero as an exponent.

  11. Root Operation: Master various math skills like estimating square roots, understanding cube numbers, and estimating cube roots quickly to excel in this section.

  12. Factors and Multiples: Simplify math fractions using the greatest common factor and prime factorization, compute the lowest common multiple, and determine the highest common factor for math efficiency.

  13. Everyday Patterns and Formulas: Examine Pascal's Triangle, math patterns, and practical formulas. Learn healthcare math formulas and essential business math strategies to master daily patterns.
targetAudiences: School students seeking a strong foundation in arithmetic and number theory, crucial for advanced mathematical studies.
College students who wish to solidify their understanding of basic math concepts or require a refresher on arithmetic principles.
Math graduates and educators looking for resources to assist in teaching foundational mathematics or to revisit core mathematical concepts.
Hobbyists and lifelong learners with an interest in math, wanting to enhance their numerical skills for personal development or professional applications.
Professionals in fields that require basic math skills, such as finance, engineering, or computer science, who seek to strengthen their mathematical background.
Parents or guardians looking to support their children’s learning in mathematics with effective and engaging teaching methods.

courseDetails.title: A Healthy Mindset for Running
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build a healthy mentality with running and yourself
courseDetails.longDescription:
No matter what experience you have with running, if you want to improve your relationship with running and enjoy it more than this is the course for you!


By the end of this course the goal is to have you look forward to running and not to face your runs with dread. I personally have seen too many people suffer from two countering thoughts of how much they want to get into running, but running is so "hard" and tiring and "not fun". I do agree with them that running is incredibly tiring, it doesn't have to be seen as hard or not fun. My 10 years of running experience has taught me that running is more of a mental game than a physical game. Here I will tell you my secrets to how I developed this "heathy running mindset" and in case you were wondering, yes, it is ok and perfectly normal now to follow a strict running schedule. However, I get into that more in the course itself.


This isn't just your everyday how to get into running course, it is you once in a lifetime course on how to learn to find the joy and inspiration in running. Fulfilling the desires hidden deep in our genetics to run, because as humans we have been running since we could stand on our own two feet.
targetAudiences: It is ok if you never ran before, or if you are a pro looking for a new approach.
As long as you have an interest in running this is for you.

courseDetails.title: Accident and Incident Reporting Training
courseDetails.shortDescription: Incident Investigation | Accident Report Writing | RIDDOR 2013 | Accident Book | Editable Template for Reporting
courseDetails.longDescription:
Did you know less than a fifth of all non-fatal workplace injuries are reported under RIDDOR (Reporting of Injuries, Diseases and Dangerous Occurrences Regulations)?

Nobody wants accidents to happen. But sadly accidents at work can happen and it is important for everyone to know what to do in case it does. A good accident reporting can help to increase safety at work. It also helps you to avoid further accidents in the future. If you want to help maintain a safe working environment, then an accident reporting course can offer all the insight you need to make your business a safer place for all.

Reporting accidents is a vital process for any and all workplaces. By recording accidents, you can identify the causes of injury and then take steps to remove or control them. Remember! Reporting accidents is a LEGAL REQUIREMENT; failure to do so can lead to getting sued, fined or prison sentences.

This short yet comprehensive course equips you to fully understand and implement accident reporting skills. You’ll be able to understand what, when and how to report accidents or incidents in the workplace. The course covers all the relevant criteria of RIDDOR 2013 and all other relevant criteria as well.

This course comes with the following Sections:

  1. What is Accident Reporting?: This module looks at the importance of keeping accident records. It should include information about Accident Books and data protection laws. It also explains what RIDDOR 2013 is and its relevance to accident reporting.

  2. What Must be Recorded?: This module should look at what MUST be recorded, and what COULD be put in the Accident Book, depending on what level of reporting an organisation uses.

  3. How to Complete a Report?: This final section is all about completing a report. It explains what information might be needed and suggests things that might be included in the report that you may not have thought about.
targetAudiences: If you want to make your workspace safe, this course is just for you.

courseDetails.title: Git from Basics to Advanced: Practical Guide for Developers
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Git from basics to advanced level. During the course we will create our own project that we will manage with Git
courseDetails.longDescription:
From this course, you can learn Git from basics to advanced concepts.

This course was created for software engineers who want to learn how to track changes with the help of Git. No matter what programming language you use - the git is equal for everyone :)

There are a lot of other courses on this topic. So, why would you choose exactly this course?  Here are just a few reasons:

- Real-life cases & demo during the video lesson 

There are a lot of other courses that taught you Git. But there are only PowerPoint presentations and nice diagrams. You may learn hundreds of git commands but you won't be able to apply them in real life after that courses.

In this course, we will imitate teamwork and work on one project from scratch. We will review different life scenarios online, on the video, I will show you the best way to approach various cases.

You are going to learn enough theory to understand practical examples and exercises. No watter :) Only Git!

- Practical orientation of the course

This is what makes this course so unique. During the course, we are not talking about super abstract things and inventing our own Git. Your focus is put on the questions that you will face on daily basis during the software development. That's why this course is called 'Practical Guide for Developers'.

- Q&A support 

The significant difference between the online and offline learning process is the instructor's availability. If you are in one room with a tutor he always can help you to get understand the specific concept or to help fix your code on your computer.
In this course, we are supporting students with answers to any questions flagged in the Q&A section. In case there will be recurring questions - separate video lessons will be created to show how to address the issue.

So with this course you are not just getting video materials, code exercises, source code, access to the free mobile application without limits (which is still pretty cool, huh? :) ), but you also get tutor support and answers to your questions along with this course.

- Relevant knowledge

After our team investigated other Java courses on Udemy we realized that most of them have nothing in common with real life. The information which is shared there is very old and significantly out of date. For example, the instructor teaches a framework which is not been used already for 15 years. Or instructors do stress on the programming design which is not used anymore at all!

The instructor of this course is a consultant in a top-rated IT outsourcing company and helps to bring cutting-edge solutions in IT for all his clients. Feel free to check the LinkedIn page of the instructor and check skills endorsement. More than 19 thousand people across all over the world (BTW most of them are from the top 100 companies of the world) evaluated the skills of Andrii Piatakha.

With this course, you can be sure that you will spend your time learning the right things from one of the best IT consultants in the world.

- High concentration of useful material in each lesson

Sometimes you can notice that watching 5 minutes of our lesson is equivalent to watching another 30 minutes lesson.

This is because time spent for preparation for the lesson (script for the lesson, lesson structure) and video editing (to cut boring pieces of the lesson or time when the program loads) sometimes 10 times as much (sometimes even 20) as the final lesson duration after video editing.

Also, each topic is separated from another. In case some concept will be explained in the next lesson and you don't need to worry about understanding this in the scope of this lesson - the instructor will make an announcement when a specific topic will be covered.

Go and try it yourself! We will appreciate your feedback.


So don't wait! Take a look at the lessons' preview if you still have doubts!

Buy this course today, and you will get all updates for FREE!

For those who successfully passed this training course, or for students who were recognized for asking amazing questions, there is a special offer from the IT-Bulls company! The creator of this course is IT-Bulls company CEO and Founder. We are always in search of talents to run our amazing startups together with you. Probably you always dreamed about running your startup? In this course, you will be able to find the team who will teach you how to do that and (in particular cases) will be glad to help with implementation!

Hope you enjoy this course! And remember, we appreciate all your feedback! Your feedback will help us to become even better! Your feedback will help us to create to best Java course ever!

See you at the lessons! :)

Además, profundizarás en temas avanzados como funciones anónimas, manejo de archivos, y mucho más, todo mientras construyes un proyecto final que demuestra tus habilidades adquiridas.

Este curso está diseñado para motivarte a pensar como un verdadero programador, solucionar problemas complejos y prepararte para desafíos reales en el mundo de la tecnología. No importa si estás comenzando tu camino en la programación o buscas fortalecer tus habilidades en Python, este curso te proporcionará las herramientas necesarias para alcanzar tus metas.

Te invitamos a unirte a nuestra comunidad de aprendizaje. Da el paso y comienza tu viaje hacia el dominio de Python, abriendo la puerta a infinitas posibilidades en tu carrera profesional. Inscríbete hoy y transforma tu futuro con la programación.

Bem-vindo ao Curso: Certificado Profissional em Liderança e Gestão


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática (Machine Learning), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da IBM, Intel e Microsoft, e membro da Câmara de Comércio e Indústria Portuguesa.

O MTF está presente em 213 países e foi escolhido por mais de 560 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva é uma profissional distinta com uma sólida combinação de experiência académica e empresarial, especializada em gestão, ética, desenvolvimento estratégico e liderança. Obteve o Doutoramento em Gestão pela Universidade Lusíada de Lisboa, onde se destacou nas áreas de gestão empresarial, e-commerce, análise crítica de modelos de gestão e metodologias de investigação avançadas, recebendo grande reconhecimento pelas suas contribuições na área.

Atualmente, exerce funções como Gestora de Projetos na Associação Portuguesa de Ética Empresarial (APEE). Este papel sublinha o seu compromisso com a promoção da inovação ética e da sustentabilidade nas organizações e nos setores público e privado.

Relativamente à sua área académica, Ana Saraiva fez contribuições significativas como consultora e investigadora no centro de investigação COMEGI da Universidade Lusíada. Colaborou com prestigiadas instituições nacionais e internacionais, incluindo o IST (Universidade de Lisboa) e várias universidades europeias, avançando na investigação e implementando soluções inovadoras nas práticas de gestão organizacionais. A sua experiência editorial inclui a gestão e indexação de revistas científicas em plataformas como Scopus, DOAJ e outras de prestígio, refletindo a sua dedicação nos elevados padrões académicos.

Com uma experiência empresarial de mais de uma década, Ana trabalhou na hotelaria de luxo, onde liderou esforços na coordenação de eventos, na garantia de qualidade e na satisfação dos hóspedes. Possui um histórico comprovado de melhoria da excelência operacional e gestão estratégica, sendo uma líder versátil e capaz de impulsionar resultados nos mais diversificados contextos.

A produção académica de Ana Saraiva é vasta, incluindo numerosos artigos revistos por pares e apresentações em conferências que abordam questões críticas em gestão, ética e transformação digital. É proficiente numa ampla gama de ferramentas e plataformas digitais, como SPSS, SAS e NVivo, utilizadas para otimizar os resultados de investigação e de negócios.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso com práticas éticas e sustentáveis, Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva dedica-se a capacitar organizações e indivíduos para alcançar a excelência através de soluções inovadoras e liderança responsável no panorama global dos negócios.


O que é Gestão de Projetos?

Gestão de projetos é a aplicação organizada de conhecimentos, processos, habilidades e ferramentas para guiar um projeto desde o seu início até a sua conclusão bem-sucedida. Envolve:

  • Definir metas: Decidir o que o projeto deve alcançar.

  • Planejamento: Mapear as etapas e os recursos necessários.

  • Execução: Colocar o plano em ação, direcionar a equipe e gerenciar os recursos.

  • Monitoramento e controle: Acompanhar o progresso, gerenciar mudanças e resolver problemas.

  • Encerramento: Revisar o projeto, documentar os resultados e aprender com a experiência.


O que é Gestão de Projetos de Negócios?

A gestão de projetos de negócios refere-se à aplicação de princípios de gestão de projetos em um ambiente de negócios. Esses projetos se concentram em alcançar objetivos de negócios, como:

  • Lançamento de novos produtos ou serviços

  • Melhorar ou automatizar processos de negócios

  • Reestruturar departamentos

  • Implementar novos sistemas de software


O Papel da Gestão de Projetos

A gestão de projetos desempenha um papel fundamental nas empresas porque:

  • Aumenta a Eficiência: Um plano de projeto bem definido ajuda a otimizar o trabalho e evitar o desperdício de esforço.

  • Garante Resultados: A gestão de projetos mantém o foco em cumprir as metas definidas dentro das restrições de tempo e orçamento.

  • Gerencia Riscos: Problemas potenciais são antecipados e mitigados por meio de planejamento e monitoramento cuidadosos.

  • Melhora a Comunicação: Canais de comunicação claros entre membros da equipe, stakeholders e clientes ajudam a evitar mal-entendidos.

  • Melhora a Satisfação do Cliente: A conclusão bem-sucedida do projeto dentro dos parâmetros acordados gera confiança com os clientes.


Por que aprender gestão de projetos é importante para as empresas?

As empresas investem no treinamento de gestão de projetos de seus funcionários porque:

  • Vantagem Competitiva: Empresas com fortes capacidades de gestão de projetos entregam projetos com mais sucesso, ganham reputação de confiabilidade e superam os concorrentes.

  • Reduz Custos: Projetos ineficientes custam mais devido a atrasos e desperdício de recursos. A gestão de projetos ajuda a otimizar os recursos.

  • Melhora o Moral dos Funcionários: Projetos bem administrados minimizam o estresse, melhoram a colaboração da equipe e criam um senso de realização.

  • Melhora a Inovação: A gestão de projetos estruturada permite gerenciar projetos de inovação, levando a uma cultura de inovação dentro da empresa.


Como as habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos impulsionam sua carreira

Desenvolver suas habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos pode melhorar significativamente suas perspectivas de carreira:

  • Alta Demanda: Gerentes de projeto são procurados em todos os setores, como TI, construção, saúde, etc.

  • Melhor Salário: Gerentes de projeto qualificados geralmente ganham salários mais altos devido à sua experiência.

  • Potencial de Liderança: A gestão de projetos fornece uma base sólida para assumir funções de liderança dentro das organizações.

  • Versatilidade: As habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos se aplicam a uma ampla gama de empregos e funções, não apenas a cargos de gerenciamento de projetos.

  • Crescimento Pessoal: Você desenvolverá habilidades organizacionais, de resolução de problemas e de comunicação, tornando-se um trunfo para qualquer equipe.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

courseDetails.title: Experto en Análisis y Visualización de Datos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende herramientas esenciales para el análisis de datos como Excel, SQL, R, Looker Studio y Power BI
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿Estás listo para convertirte en un maestro en el arte del análisis de datos y la creación de visualizaciones impactantes? Nuestro curso "Experto en Análisis y Visualización de Datos" te llevará a través de un emocionante viaje hacia la dominación de herramientas clave y prácticas avanzadas en el mundo del análisis de datos y la visualización.

Este curso abarca una amplia gama de temas, desde las habilidades fundamentales hasta las estrategias de expertos, permitiéndote enfrentar los desafíos más complejos en el análisis y la visualización de datos. Nuestra metodología de aprendizaje guiada te llevará de la mano a medida que te adentras en cuatro partes distintas, cada una centrada en una herramienta y enfoque específico.

Lo que Aprenderás:

En la primera parte, te especializarás en dashboards profesionales en Microsoft Excel, adquiriendo habilidades para crear y gestionar paneles de control avanzados y eficientes. Aprenderás a integrar datos, aplicar análisis y presentar información de manera clara y convincente.

La segunda parte te llevará al mundo de las consultas SQL, donde dominarás el lenguaje de consultas, aprendiendo a extraer, filtrar, ordenar y resumir datos de manera efectiva. También aprenderás a optimizar consultas para un rendimiento máximo y a enfrentar desafíos complejos.

En la tercera parte, te sumergirás en el análisis de datos con R Programming. Desde tipos de datos hasta funciones avanzadas, serás capaz de manipular, analizar y visualizar datos de manera profesional.

La cuarta parte te introducirá a Looker Studio, perfeccionando la creación de visualizaciones atractivas y personalizadas. Aprenderás a comunicar información con claridad y precisión a través de visualizaciones interactivas.

La quinta parte se centrará en Power BI, donde descubrirás cómo transformar datos en decisiones informadas. Desde la conexión de datos hasta el diseño de reportes atractivos, te convertirás en un experto en el ciclo completo de análisis y presentación.

Por qué Elegir Nuestro Curso:

Aprendizaje Profundo: Nuestro enfoque se basa en un aprendizaje profundo y progresivo, permitiéndote construir habilidades desde lo básico hasta lo avanzado.

Práctica Real: A lo largo del curso, enfrentarás proyectos reales y ejercicios prácticos que reflejan desafíos del mundo real, asegurando que estés listo para aplicar tus conocimientos.

Instructores Experimentados: Nuestros instructores son expertos en análisis de datos y visualización, brindándote orientación experta a lo largo de tu viaje educativo.

Certificación: Al finalizar el curso, recibirás una certificación que acredita tus habilidades como Experto en Análisis y Visualización de Datos.

Prepárate para convertirte en un líder en el mundo del análisis de datos y la visualización. Únete a nosotros en este emocionante viaje y descubre cómo tus habilidades pueden transformar datos en conocimiento significativo. ¡El futuro del análisis y la visualización está en tus manos!
targetAudiences: Principiantes en Análisis de Datos: Si eres nuevo en el mundo del análisis de datos y estás emocionado por aprender, este curso te brindará una introducción sólida y te guiará a través de herramientas clave paso a paso.

Estudiantes y Académicos: Si eres estudiante o académico interesado en fortalecer tus habilidades en el análisis de datos y visualización, este curso te brindará una base sólida para futuras investigaciones y proyectos.

Profesionales en Business Intelligence: Si trabajas en Business Intelligence y deseas profundizar tus conocimientos en herramientas como Power BI y Looker Studio, este curso te brindará técnicas avanzadas.

courseDetails.title: GIT, GitLab, GitHub Fundamentals for Software Developers
courseDetails.shortDescription: GIT, GitLab, GitHub Fundamentals for Software Developers, Basics of Work, Command Line, GUI, Intro to GIT for Beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: GIT, GitLab, GitHub Fundamentals for Software Developers

GIT, GitLab, GitHub Fundamentals for Software Developers, Basics of work, Command Line & GUI, Intro to GIT for Beginners


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 520 000 students.


Importance of Git Skills for Software Developers and Effective Software Development at Enterprise Companies

Mastering Git, particularly in conjunction with platforms like GitLab and GitHub, is crucial for software developers and the overall success of software development within enterprise companies. Let's break down the significance of each skill set you mentioned:


  • Version Control: Git allows developers to track changes to code over time, creating a history of modifications. This enables easy backtracking to previous versions if errors occur or features need to be rolled back.

  • Collaboration: Git facilitates seamless collaboration among multiple developers working on the same codebase. Developers can work on different features concurrently, merge their changes, and resolve conflicts in a controlled manner.

  • Code Safety: Git acts as a safety net, allowing developers to experiment without fear of irreparably damaging the codebase. Branches and commits provide isolation for new features or bug fixes.


  • Command Line Proficiency: Understanding Git commands empowers developers to execute precise actions and troubleshoot issues effectively.

  • GUI Fluency: Graphical interfaces like those in GitLab and GitHub simplify common Git operations, making it more accessible for beginners and streamlining workflows.

  • Platform Compatibility: Familiarity with both GitLab and GitHub ensures adaptability across different development environments and collaborative projects.


  • Foundation for Growth: This introductory knowledge lays the groundwork for further exploration of Git's capabilities and advanced features.

  • Confidence Building: Mastering the basics empowers developers to contribute to projects and collaborate effectively, boosting confidence and engagement.

  • Industry Standard: Git is a ubiquitous tool in software development. Proficiency is essential for career advancement and employability.


Benefits for Enterprise Software Development

  • Enhanced Collaboration: Git facilitates effective communication and coordination among large teams, promoting efficient development and reducing bottlenecks.

  • Improved Code Quality: Version control, code reviews, and branching strategies contribute to higher code quality and fewer bugs.

  • Accelerated Development: Git's features, such as branching and merging, enable parallel development and faster release cycles.

  • Streamlined Onboarding: New developers can quickly get up to speed by accessing the project's Git repository and understanding its history.

  • Reduced Risk: Git's safety net and version control minimize the risk of code loss or corruption, protecting valuable intellectual property.


Git proficiency is indispensable for modern software developers and plays a vital role in driving successful software development at enterprise companies. Investing in Git training and fostering a culture of collaboration around Git practices yields significant benefits in terms of productivity, code quality, and overall project success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any, who want to build a career at Software Development or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies
courseDetails.shortDescription: Introductional course, Usage of Research and Analytical Methodologies in Business and Science
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 520 000 students.


Course Author:

Cristiana Silva is a senior education technician with 4 years' experience in coordinating pedagogical and social projects in Higher Education Institutions and Private Social Solidarity Institutions. She began her work in an academic environment, where she obtained her Master's Degree in Education, in the specialization area of Adult Education and Community Intervention at the University of Minho and worked as an educational researcher, responsible for designing course curricula and managing course quality assessment processes. She is currently a learning designer at the Polytechnic of Cávado and Ave in Barcelos. With a passion for adult education, she has also been president of the C.R.I.A. Dialogues Association since 2021.


The short course "Research Methodologies" aims to provide an introductory understanding of scientific research in Administration. This course equips students with the necessary skills to design, develop, and evaluate research plans. As future business managers, students should be able to use data collection techniques and instruments to develop or improve business strategies, such as questionnaires, interviews, and document analysis.

At the end of the course, students should be able to:

  • Understand the characteristics of management research.

  • Explain techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data.

  • Write, present, and disseminate scientific work.

  • Understand ethical principles in research.

  • Prepare bibliographical references.


The structure of the search methodologies course:

  • Characteristics and paradigms of management research

  • Techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data

  • Research methodologies

  • Writing, presenting, and disseminating scientific work

  • Ethics in research

  • Bibliographical references


This course lays the foundation for both academic success and effective business management by equipping students with the essential skills to conduct rigorous research and analyze complex information.


1. Scientific Activity and Capstone Project Preparation

  • Research Design: The course empowers students to design robust research studies. This includes formulating clear research questions, selecting appropriate methodologies, and collecting and analyzing data systematically. These skills are crucial for scientific investigations and directly applicable to the Capstone Project, where students are expected to conduct independent research.

  • Critical Thinking and Data Analysis: Students learn to approach information critically, evaluate evidence, and draw sound conclusions. This analytical mindset is essential in science and in crafting a compelling Capstone Project that demonstrates a deep understanding of a chosen topic.

  • Scientific Communication: The course helps students develop effective communication skills, enabling them to present their findings clearly and persuasively, both in written and oral formats. This skill is vital for sharing research results within the scientific community and defending the Capstone Project before a panel.


2. Application in Real Business and Management

  • Informed Decision-Making: In the business world, decisions must be based on solid evidence. The course equips students with the tools to conduct market research, analyze competitor strategies, and evaluate the effectiveness of various business initiatives. This data-driven approach minimizes risks and maximizes opportunities.

  • Problem-Solving: Businesses constantly face challenges. The course teaches students to identify problems, gather relevant data, analyze the root causes, and develop effective solutions. This structured problem-solving approach is invaluable for managers at all levels.

  • Performance Evaluation: The ability to measure and compare results is essential for continuous improvement. The course enables students to track key performance indicators, identify trends, and make data-driven adjustments to optimize business outcomes.

  • Innovation and Adaptation: The business landscape is constantly evolving. The course fosters a mindset of curiosity and inquiry, encouraging students to stay abreast of new developments, conduct research, and adapt their strategies to remain competitive.


"Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies" provides students with a versatile skillset that is crucial for both academic and professional success. By emphasizing rigorous research, critical thinking, and effective communication, the course empowers students to make informed decisions, solve complex problems, and drive innovation in the dynamic world of business.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Business or Science

courseDetails.title: Funciones, Tablas dinámicas, ChatGPT y más con Google Sheets
courseDetails.shortDescription: Luis, Google Certified Educator, te guiará paso a paso para dominar Google Sheets
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿Estás listo para transformar números y datos en decisiones inteligentes y presentaciones impactantes? Nuestro curso de Google Sheets está diseñado para equiparte con habilidades prácticas que te convertirán en un maestro del análisis de datos y la automatización de tareas.

Desde la comodidad de tu navegador, desbloquearás el potencial de una de las herramientas más poderosas y accesibles para la gestión de datos. Te guiaremos paso a paso a través de la interfaz intuitiva de Google Sheets, mostrándote cómo personalizar tu espacio de trabajo y manejar datos como un profesional.

Aprenderás a importar y manipular datos con precisión, realizar cálculos matemáticos complejos, y usar funciones avanzadas para trabajar con texto, fechas y lógica. Nuestro enfoque práctico te permitirá dominar desde las funciones más básicas hasta las técnicas de anidación y agregación condicional.

Pero no nos detenemos ahí. Te sumergirás en el mundo del análisis de datos, aprendiendo a crear dashboards interactivos y visualizaciones que cuentan la historia detrás de los números. Además, la introducción a las macros y la integración de Chat GPT te abrirá las puertas a la automatización y la inteligencia artificial, haciendo que tus hojas de cálculo trabajen por ti.

No importa si eres un completo novato o alguien con experiencia buscando perfeccionar sus habilidades, este curso te proporcionará los conocimientos y la confianza necesarios para destacar en cualquier contexto profesional o personal.

Inscríbete hoy y comienza tu viaje hacia la maestría en Google Sheets. ¡Los datos esperan ser dominados por ti!
targetAudiences: Profesionales que buscan eficiencia en el análisis de datos.
Estudiantes que desean ampliar sus habilidades en herramientas digitales.
Emprendedores que necesitan gestionar datos para la toma de decisiones.
Usuarios de nivel básico e intermedio de hojas de cálculo.

courseDetails.title: Crea un Sistema de Compra y Venta con PHP, JS y MYSQL
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprender a Crear un sistema de Compra y venta con PHP, SQL MYSQL y JS DE 0 A 100
courseDetails.longDescription:
Este curso está diseñado para llevarte de principiante a experto en la creación de un sistema de compra y venta en línea, utilizando PHP, MySQL y JavaScript. Aprenderás desde los fundamentos de la programación en PHP hasta la implementación de bases de datos SQL en MySQL, además de técnicas avanzadas en JavaScript para crear una interfaz dinámica y fluida.

Contenido del Curso:

  1. Introducción a PHP y la Lógica de un Sistema de Compra/Venta

    • Configuración de tu entorno de desarrollo.

    • Fundamentos de PHP y conceptos clave de programación.

  2. Diseño e Implementación de Bases de Datos con MySQL

    • Creación de tablas para productos, usuarios, ventas y más.

    • Relaciones entre tablas y consultas SQL avanzadas.

  3. Desarrollo del Backend: Manejo de Datos con PHP y SQL

    • Conexión entre PHP y MySQL.

    • CRUD completo: Crear, Leer, Actualizar y Eliminar datos.

    • Seguridad y validación de datos en el backend.

  4. Desarrollo del Frontend: Interactividad con JavaScript

    • Estructura básica del frontend.

    • Implementación de JavaScript para validación y carga dinámica.

    • Mejora de la experiencia del usuario con AJAX.

  5. Integración Completa del Sistema

    • Carrito de compras, manejo de inventario y sistema de pedidos.

    • Sistema de autenticación de usuarios (registro e inicio de sesión).

    • Gestión de roles de usuario (administrador, cliente, etc.).

  6. Optimización y Seguridad Avanzada

    • Prevención de ataques SQL Injection y Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).

    • Buenas prácticas para la seguridad de contraseñas y datos sensibles.

Objetivos del Curso:

  • Dominar PHP y SQL para crear sistemas completos y funcionales.

  • Aprender a crear e integrar un frontend con JavaScript.

  • Desarrollar habilidades para crear un sistema de compra y venta seguro y escalable.

Este curso es ideal tanto para principiantes que desean aprender a crear aplicaciones web como para programadores que desean perfeccionar sus habilidades en sistemas de compra/venta en línea. ¡Inscríbete y comienza a construir tu propio sistema desde cero hasta convertirte en un experto!
targetAudiences: Desarrolladores de Software
Programadores de Base de Datos
Desarrolladores de APP Web

courseDetails.title: Curso Python - Agrupación y Agregación de Datos con Pandas
courseDetails.shortDescription: Jorge, con experiencia en programación, te guiará en el aprendizaje de Python desde cero.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿Listo para llevar tus habilidades de análisis de datos al siguiente nivel y destacar en un mundo impulsado por la información? Este curso te enseñará cómo agrupar, resumir y transformar datos utilizando pandas, la biblioteca esencial para la manipulación de datos en Python. Aprenderás desde las bases hasta técnicas avanzadas que te permitirán obtener insights valiosos y tomar decisiones fundamentadas en cualquier área profesional.

Comenzaremos explicando los conceptos clave de agrupación y agregación, y te guiaremos para configurar tu entorno de trabajo con herramientas como Jupyter Notebook. Progresivamente, dominarás el uso de funciones estadísticas, la creación de Pivot Tables dinámicas y el análisis de tablas de contingencia, todo mientras adquieres un enfoque práctico y aplicado al manejo de datos complejos.

Además, te adentrarás en técnicas avanzadas como agregaciones múltiples, transformaciones dentro de grupos y la creación de visualizaciones impactantes. Cada lección combina teoría con ejercicios prácticos para que puedas consolidar lo aprendido y aplicarlo a tus propios proyectos.

Al final del curso, trabajarás en un proyecto práctico donde aplicarás todas las habilidades adquiridas para resolver un problema real, consolidando tus conocimientos y preparándote para desafíos en áreas como marketing, finanzas, ciencia de datos y más.

Este curso está diseñado tanto para principiantes en el análisis de datos como para profesionales que buscan mejorar sus habilidades. No importa tu nivel, este es el momento perfecto para aprender a manejar grandes volúmenes de información con confianza y precisión.

Te invitamos a unirte a nuestra comunidad de aprendizaje. Da el paso y descubre cómo dominar pandas y el análisis de datos puede abrirte puertas en tu carrera profesional. ¡Inscríbete hoy y transforma tus habilidades en herramientas poderosas para el éxito!

courseDetails.title: Finanzas Personales: Éxito financiero a tu alcance
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a manejar tus finanzas personales de manera efectiva y construye un futuro financiero sólido.
courseDetails.longDescription:
En este curso de finanzas personales, los estudiantes aprenderán una amplia variedad de conceptos y herramientas clave para tomar el control de sus finanzas y tomar decisiones financieras más informadas. Comenzaremos por comprender conceptos fundamentales como la inflación, los intereses, la liquidez y la importancia de proteger nuestras inversiones y nuestro retiro.

A continuación, aprenderemos a identificar nuestra situación financiera actual mediante el cálculo de un balance personal, lo que nos ayudará a tener una visión clara de nuestros activos y pasivos. También exploraremos cómo realizar un seguimiento de nuestros ingresos y egresos utilizando una calculadora de ingresos y egresos, lo que nos permitirá tomar decisiones más informadas sobre nuestro presupuesto.

El curso también abordará la importancia de tener un patrimonio y cómo calcular cuánto debemos ahorrar para alcanzar nuestros objetivos financieros. Aprenderemos a tomar decisiones inteligentes sobre qué hacer con nuestros ahorros, ya sea para invertir, pagar deudas o construir un fondo de emergencia.

Además, exploraremos estrategias para proteger tanto a nosotros mismos como a nuestro patrimonio, así como la elaboración de un presupuesto efectivo y la gestión de gastos fijos. También analizaremos cómo aumentar nuestros ingresos y cuál es la mejor inversión para nuestros objetivos financieros.

En resumen, este curso proporcionará a los estudiantes las habilidades y conocimientos necesarios para tomar el control de sus finanzas personales, planificar su futuro financiero y tomar decisiones financieras sólidas y fundamentadas.
targetAudiences: Este curso está dirigido a cualquier persona interesada en mejorar su comprensión de las finanzas personales y tomar el control de su situación financiera.

courseDetails.title: Reframing Healthcare Revolution
courseDetails.shortDescription: Transforming the Future of Care
courseDetails.longDescription:
"Reframing Healthcare Revolution: Transforming the Future of Care" is a comprehensive guide for healthcare professionals looking to improve patient care, communication, and their own well-being.

This course provides a practical framework for reframing negative thoughts, emotions, and behaviors, and replacing them with positive, empowering ones.


Through real-life examples, exercises, and case studies, this course guides how reframing techniques can be applied in various healthcare settings and situations, including:


--> Managing Stress and Burnout

--> Improving Patient Outcomes

--> Enhancing Communication and Teamwork

--> Promoting Empathy and Compassion

--> Fostering a Positive Work Culture


This course is essential for healthcare professionals seeking to create a more supportive, patient-centered, and compassionate healthcare system. By learning and applying reframing techniques, healthcare professionals can transform their practice, improve patient care, and enhance their own well-being.


This book provides a comprehensive guide to reframing techniques, including their application in various healthcare settings and situations. Through real-life examples, exercises, and case studies, we will explore the benefits and challenges of reframing and provide practical strategies for overcoming obstacles and achieving success.


Whether you are a nurse, doctor, therapist, or healthcare administrator, this course is for you. Our goal is to empower healthcare professionals with the skills and knowledge necessary to create a more compassionate, patient-centered, and supportive healthcare system.


So let us begin this journey together, and discover the transformative power of reframing in healthcare.
targetAudiences: Healthcare Professionals and Aspirants

courseDetails.title: Curso SQL - Consultas en SQL para principiantes + ChatGPT
courseDetails.shortDescription: Jorge, con experiencia en bases de datos, te enseñará SQL desde cero.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Aprende SQL desde cero y conviértete en un experto en bases de datos con este curso completo de SQL. Este curso te guiará a través de todos los aspectos esenciales de SQL, desde la creación de bases de datos y consultas básicas hasta la optimización avanzada de consultas.

En este curso, adquirirás un sólido conocimiento de SQL y desarrollarás habilidades prácticas que te permitirán trabajar eficientemente con bases de datos. Comenzaremos con una introducción detallada a SQL y su importancia en el campo laboral actual, explorando las diversas oportunidades profesionales que ofrece.

Aprenderás a instalar y configurar MySQL en Windows, crear bases de datos y gestionar usuarios. Conocerás la sintaxis básica de SQL y utilizarás la popular herramienta MySQL Workbench para ejecutar consultas.

Dominarás las consultas SELECT con una sola tabla, aprenderás a utilizar alias de columnas y a filtrar datos utilizando la cláusula WHERE. Descubrirás los operadores de comparación y lógicos para realizar consultas más complejas, y utilizarás operadores como BETWEEN, LIKE e IN para refinar tus resultados.

Exploraremos las cláusulas ORDER BY y LIMIT para ordenar y limitar los resultados de tus consultas. Aprenderás a utilizar funciones de agregado como COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX y MIN para obtener información resumida de tus datos. Además, entenderás los conceptos de llaves primarias y foráneas, y te sumergirás en el mundo de los joins, incluyendo inner join, left join y right join.

Además, este curso te enseñará a utilizar subconsultas en diferentes cláusulas (SELECT, FROM, WHERE y HAVING) para realizar consultas más complejas y obtener datos específicos. Aprenderás a identificar y optimizar consultas lentas, utilizando índices y ajustando la memoria caché para mejorar el rendimiento de tu base de datos.

Enriqueciendo aún más el contenido del curso, se incluye un módulo innovador sobre la integración de ChatGPT para la creación y consulta de bases de datos. Aprenderás a utilizar las capacidades avanzadas de ChatGPT para generar consultas SQL, interpretar y analizar resultados de bases de datos, y automatizar tareas de gestión de datos. Este enfoque te permitirá aprovechar la inteligencia artificial para facilitar el manejo de grandes volúmenes de datos y realizar consultas complejas de manera más eficiente. Con ejemplos prácticos y ejercicios interactivos, podrás ver cómo ChatGPT puede ser una herramienta poderosa para complementar tus habilidades en SQL y llevarte al siguiente nivel en el campo de las bases de datos.


Con ejemplos prácticos y ejercicios, este curso te brinda las herramientas necesarias para convertirte en un experto en SQL y maximizar tu eficiencia en el manejo de bases de datos. No importa si eres un principiante absoluto o si ya tienes experiencia en SQL, este curso te llevará desde los fundamentos hasta la optimización de consultas, brindándote las habilidades necesarias para destacar en el campo laboral.


¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu camino hacia la maestría en SQL!
targetAudiences: Está dirigido a quienes dan sus primeros pasos hacia una formación de Data Analyst (Analista de datos), Data Scientist (Científico de Datos) o de DBA (Data Base Administrador - Administrador de Bases de Datos).

courseDetails.title: Power BI: Gráficos y visualización de datos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Juan Carlos, con más de 10 años de experiencia en Business Intelligence, te enseñará visualizaciones en Power BI
courseDetails.longDescription:
Sumérgete en el mundo del análisis de datos con nuestro exhaustivo curso de Power BI. Este curso está especialmente diseñado para aquellos que buscan profundizar en la visualización de datos, desde principiantes hasta profesionales. A lo largo de nuestro programa, explorarás los fundamentos de los gráficos y la importancia de la visualización de datos, empezando con conceptos básicos y avanzando hacia técnicas más sofisticadas.

Abordarás gráficos básicos como barras y columnas apiladas, barras y columnas agrupadas, y aprenderás a dar formato y estilo a tus visualizaciones en Power BI para una comunicación de datos más efectiva. Te adentrarás en gráficos avanzados, incluyendo gráficos de funnel, dispersión, y circulares, así como gráficos de árbol y mapas, desarrollando habilidades para analizar y representar datos complejos.

Este curso de Power BI también te capacitará en técnicas especializadas como la creación de gráficos de áreas apiladas, gráficos de cinta, y small multiples, así como en la aplicación de analíticos y forecasting para predecir tendencias futuras. Además, te sumergirás en gráficos flat como gráficos de tarjeta, tacómetros, y gráficos de KPI, perfeccionando tu habilidad para presentar métricas clave y datos críticos.

Con un enfoque práctico, realizarás un caso práctico, trabajando con mapas y datos de latitud y longitud, generando gráficos de barras y columnas, y empleando técnicas de segmentación de datos. Para aquellos interesados en expandir su repertorio, ofrecemos un segmento de gráficos de Microsoft Store y consejos sobre cuándo seleccionar cada tipo de gráfico.

Al finalizar este curso de Power BI, tendrás una comprensión profunda de cómo seleccionar, crear, y presentar gráficos para maximizar el impacto de tus análisis de datos. Únete a nosotros y transforma tu manera de trabajar con datos, convirtiéndote en un experto en visualización de datos con Power BI.
targetAudiences: Profesionales de Negocios y Analistas de Datos: Quienes buscan capitalizar el poder de Power BI para tomar decisiones basadas en datos.
Estudiantes de Carreras Relacionadas con Datos: Como administración de empresas, finanzas, marketing, que deseen añadir habilidades prácticas de visualización de datos a su conjunto de habilidades.
Entusiastas de Excel y BI: Individuos con experiencia en hojas de cálculo que quieren dar el siguiente paso en análisis de datos.
Profesionales de IT y Sistemas: Que necesiten crear informes dinámicos y dashboards para interpretar grandes volúmenes de datos.
Educadores y Académicos: Que deseen incorporar visualizaciones de datos en sus métodos de enseñanza y proyectos de investigación.

courseDetails.title: Crea juegos 2D con  JAVASCRIPT Y CANVAS
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a programar Juegos en JS.  creación de niveles , dificultades y mucho más!
courseDetails.longDescription:
El mundo de los juegos es grande y fascinante y divertido , hay muchas lenguajes de programacion  y posiblidades para desarrollarlos y una de la más usadas y potentes es JavaScript, para que tus juegos puedan estar implementadas  en la web, y de accesso a todo el mundo desde dispositivos tan usados como tablets, smartphones . Por ello en este curso aprenderas a desarrollar con JavaScript diferentes rutinas y funciones enfocadas al desarrollo de un juego, aunque tales conocimientos igualmente puedes orientarlos a tus propios objetivos.



que es javascript?

JavaScript es un lenguaje de programación que los desarrolladores utilizan para hacer páginas web interactivas. Desde actualizar fuentes de redes sociales a mostrar animaciones y mapas interactivos, las funciones de JavaScript pueden mejorar la experiencia del usuario de un sitio web. Como lenguaje de scripting del lado del servidor, se trata de una de las principales tecnologías de la World Wide Web. Por ejemplo, al navegar por Internet, en cualquier momento en el que vea un carrusel de imágenes, un menú desplegable “click-to-show” (clic para mostrar), o cambien de manera dinámica los elementos de color en una página web, estará viendo los efectos de JavaScript.


¿Qué es la programación orientada a objetos ?

La programación orientada a objetos (Object Oriented Programming, OOP) es un modelo de programación informática que organiza el diseño de software en torno a datos u objetos, en lugar de funciones y lógica. Un objeto se puede definir como un campo de datos que tiene atributos y comportamiento únicos.

programadores
ingenieros de sistemas

What is Project Management?

Project management is the organized application of knowledge, processes, skills, and tools to guide a project from its beginning to its successful completion. It involves:

  • Defining goals: Deciding what the project should achieve.

  • Planning: Mapping out the steps and resources needed.

  • Executing: Putting the plan into action, directing the team, and managing resources.

  • Monitoring and controlling: Tracking progress, managing changes, and addressing issues.

  • Closing: Reviewing the project, documenting results, and learning from the experience.


What is Business Project Management?

Business project management refers to applying project management principles within a business setting. These projects focus on achieving business objectives such as:

  • Launching new products or services

  • Improving or automating business processes

  • Restructuring departments

  • Implementing new software systems


The Role of Project Management

Project management plays a critical role in businesses because it:

  • Increases Efficiency: A well-defined project plan helps streamline work and avoid wasted effort.

  • Ensures Results: Project management keeps the focus on meeting defined goals within time and budget restrictions.

  • Manages Risk: Potential problems are anticipated and mitigated through careful planning and monitoring.

  • Improves Communication: Clear communication channels among team members, stakeholders, and clients help avoid misunderstandings.

  • Improves Client Satisfaction: Successful project completion within agreed-upon parameters builds trust with clients.


Why is Learning Project Management Important for Companies?

Companies invest in their employees' project management training because:

Competitive Advantage: Companies with strong project management capabilities deliver projects more successfully, gain a reputation for reliability, and outperform competitors.

Reduces Costs: Inefficient projects cost more due to delays and wasted resources. Project management helps optimize resources.

Enhances Employee Morale: Well-run projects minimize stress, improve team collaboration, and create a sense of accomplishment.

Improves Innovation: Structured project management allows for managing innovation projects, leading to a culture of innovation within the company.


How Project Management Skills Boost Your Career

Developing your project management skills can significantly enhance your career prospects:

High Demand: Project managers are in demand across industries like IT, construction, healthcare, etc.

Better Salary: Skilled project managers often earn higher salaries due to their expertise.

Leadership Potential: Project management provides a solid foundation for taking on leadership roles within organizations.

Versatility: Project management skills apply to a wide range of jobs and roles, not just project management positions.

Personal Growth: You'll build organizational, problem-solving, and communication skills, making you an asset to any team
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Project Management

Autor do curso:

A sua formação culminou com um Doutoramento em Análise Económica e Estratégia Empresarial, com menção "cum laude", pela Universidade de Santiago de Compostela.

Profissionalmente, o Dr. Nunes navegou por diversos setores, incluindo tecnologia, comércio internacional e consultoria, desempenhando funções que vão desde analista de negócios até diretor. Atualmente, aplica a sua vasta experiência na indústria e os seus conhecimentos académicos como Professor em vários programas de DBA, contribuindo para a formação da próxima geração de profissionais.


Definição e Importância da Gestão

Gestão é o processo de coordenar e supervisionar as atividades de uma organização para alcançar seus objetivos


Envolve planear, organizar, liderar e controlar recursos, incluindo humanos, financeiros e materiais, para garantir

operações eficientes e eficazes.


Elementos-chave da gestão:

  • Planeamento: Definir objetivos e determinar o melhor curso de ação para alcançá-los.

  • Organizar: Organizar recursos e tarefas de forma estruturada para atingir os objetivos.

  • Liderar: Direcionar e motivar as pessoas a trabalharem em prol dos objetivos da organização.

  • Controlo: Monitorizar e avaliar o progresso para garantir que os objetivos são atingidos.


Importância da Gestão:

  • Atingir Metas: A Gestão ajuda as organizações a definir e atingir os seus objetivos, garantindo que todas as atividades estão alinhadas com os resultados desejados.

  • Otimização de recursos: A gestão eficiente garante que os recursos são utilizados de forma eficaz, minimizando o desperdício e maximizando a produtividade.

  • Adaptabilidade e Inovação: As boas práticas de gestão permitem que as organizações se adaptem a ambientes em mudança e fomentem a inovação.

  • Motivação e Desenvolvimento dos Colaboradores: Uma gestão eficaz envolve liderar e motivar os colaboradores, o que aumenta a satisfação no trabalho e o crescimento pessoal.

  • Vantagem competitiva: Práticas de gestão sólidas dão às organizações uma vantagem competitiva, melhorando a eficiência, a produtividade e o desempenho geral.


LIDERANÇA:


Definição geral: A liderança pode ser vista como a arte de motivar um grupo de pessoas a atingir um objetivo comum. Implica não só a gestão de recursos, mas também inspirar e moldar o futuro das organizações.


Âmbito:  A aula abordará os aspectos fundamentais da liderança, incluindo a sua definição, significado e as várias abordagens teóricas que têm sido desenvolvidas ao longo do tempo.


Relevância moderna: A liderança é fundamentalmente uma questão de influência. Envolve a capacidade de um indivíduo para inspirar, motivar e permitir que outros contribuam para a eficácia e o sucesso da organização.


Desafios: No atual ambiente em rápida mudança, marcado pela globalização, avanços tecnológicos e desafios éticos complexos, a liderança torna-se cada vez mais crítica.


A IMPORTÂNCIA DA LIDERANÇA NAS ORGANIZAÇÕES:


Adaptação e mudança: Os líderes eficazes são essenciais para navegar através de mudanças e incertezas, orientando as organizações através de processos de transformação e adaptando-se a novos paradigmas.


Cultura e ética organizacional: Os líderes desempenham um papel crucial na formação da cultura organizacional e na promoção de um clima ético, influenciando o comportamento dos empregados e o ethos organizacional geral.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

courseDetails.title: Easy Guitar for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Step by step guitar course. 5 minute lessons. Learn to play chords, melodies, warm up exercises, music theory...
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the guitar for beginners course!


My name is Filip Flego, I am a professional guitar player and teacher, and I will lead you through the process of learning guitar.


We will start from the absolute beginning, and we will cover basic chords, melodies, rhythms, and left and right-hand techniques. We will do all that using original songs composed specially for this course.


Now and then, there are warm-up and theory lessons.
Warm-up lessons will help you develop different techniques, synchronize between left and right hand, and gain strength in the left hand.

Theory lessons will help you to systemize all the knowledge that you will gain.


Each lesson video lasts for max. 5 minutes. I suggest you dedicate 15 to 30 minutes to each lesson. Make pauses and watch some parts twice if you need it.

My other suggestion is that you practice at least 5 days in a week.


Every lesson is structured this way (except warm-up lessons and theory lessons):

1) I play the song

2) Explanation step by step - here you are learning. Make pauses if you need or watch some parts twice.

3) We play together - when you feel confident about your playing, here we do it together! ;)

4) After each lesson, you will download the PDF file with notation, TABs, comments, and further explanations to better understand what you have just learned to play, as well as to learn how you can write and read music.


IF YOU ARE NOT SATISFIED WITH THIS COURSE AFTER THE PURCHASE, THERE IS A 30 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE!


If you never touched a guitar before, and don't know anything about music (but you would love to play guitar, and understand music), I designed this course for you.

This is the right place to start.

Make yourself a coffee, grab a guitar and let's learn to play it the easy way!

See you in your first lesson :)


____________________________________________

List of knowledge and skills you will gain until the end of this course:

1) Chords: C, D, Dmin, D7, E, Emin, E7, F, F#7, G, G7, A, Amin, Amin7, A7, Bmin, B7

LIDERANÇA:


Definição geral: A liderança pode ser vista como a arte de motivar um grupo de pessoas a atingir um objetivo comum. Implica não só a gestão de recursos, mas também inspirar e moldar o futuro das organizações.


Âmbito:  A aula abordará os aspectos fundamentais da liderança, incluindo a sua definição, significado e as várias abordagens teóricas que têm sido desenvolvidas ao longo do tempo.


Relevância moderna: A liderança é fundamentalmente uma questão de influência. Envolve a capacidade de um indivíduo para inspirar, motivar e permitir que outros contribuam para a eficácia e o sucesso da organização.


Desafios: No atual ambiente em rápida mudança, marcado pela globalização, avanços tecnológicos e desafios éticos complexos, a liderança torna-se cada vez mais crítica.


A IMPORTÂNCIA DA LIDERANÇA NAS ORGANIZAÇÕES:


Adaptação e mudança: Os líderes eficazes são essenciais para navegar através de mudanças e incertezas, orientando as organizações através de processos de transformação e adaptando-se a novos paradigmas.


Cultura e ética organizacional: Os líderes desempenham um papel crucial na formação da cultura organizacional e na promoção de um clima ético, influenciando o comportamento dos empregados e o ethos organizacional geral.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

O nosso objetivo é proporcionar-lhe uma compreensão sistemática dos desafios e considerações éticas que os líderes de hoje enfrentam em vários contextos organizacionais. Começamos por definir o que a liderança realmente implica - não se trata apenas de gerir, mas de inspirar e influenciar os outros para atingir um objetivo comum. Iremos aprofundar várias teorias de liderança. Através de uma mistura de conhecimentos teóricos e estudos de casos práticos, veremos como uma liderança eficaz é crucial para orientar a mudança, moldar a cultura organizacional e defender a ética e a responsabilidade social
Objetivo: Proporcionar uma compreensão sistemática dos desafios que os gestores contemporâneos enfrentam, centrando-se na ética e nas melhores práticas de liderança nas organizações actuais.

This course is primarily designed for beginners but also serves as a valuable refresher for individuals with a year or two of industry experience. Additionally, while IPv4 remains the primary protocol in use, it's important to be familiar with IPv6 as it's increasingly encountered in various networking scenarios. This course will help you recognize and work with both protocols effectively.

By the end of this course, you will have a solid foundation in networking basics. courseDetails.title: Introdução à Gestão
courseDetails.shortDescription: Introdução à Gestão, Gestão nas Organizações, Modelos de Gestão, Planeamento e Tomada de Decisão, Ambiente de Gestão
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Introdução à Gestão


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática (Machine Learning), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da IBM, Intel e Microsoft, e membro da Câmara de Comércio e Indústria Portuguesa.

O MTF está presente em 210 países e foi escolhido por mais de 520 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

O Dr. Pedro Nunes construiu uma carreira multifacetada, combinando com sucesso o mundo académico com a experiência prática no mundo dos negócios. A sua formação culminou com um Doutoramento em Análise Económica e Estratégia Empresarial, com menção "cum laude", pela Universidade de Santiago de Compostela.

Profissionalmente, o Dr. Nunes navegou por diversos setores, incluindo tecnologia, comércio internacional e consultoria, desempenhando funções que vão desde analista de negócios até diretor. Atualmente, aplica a sua vasta experiência na indústria e os seus conhecimentos académicos como Professor em vários programas de DBA, contribuindo para a formação da próxima geração de profissionais.


Definição e Importância da Gestão

Gestão é o processo de coordenar e supervisionar as atividades de uma organização para alcançar seus objetivos


Envolve planear, organizar, liderar e controlar recursos, incluindo humanos, financeiros e materiais, para garantir

operações eficientes e eficazes.


Elementos-chave da gestão:

  • Planeamento: Definir objetivos e determinar o melhor curso de ação para alcançá-los.

  • Organizar: Organizar recursos e tarefas de forma estruturada para atingir os objetivos.

  • Liderar: Direcionar e motivar as pessoas a trabalharem em prol dos objetivos da organização.

  • Controlo: Monitorizar e avaliar o progresso para garantir que os objetivos são atingidos.


Importância da Gestão:

  • Atingir Metas: A Gestão ajuda as organizações a definir e atingir os seus objetivos, garantindo que todas as atividades estão alinhadas com os resultados desejados.

  • Otimização de recursos: A gestão eficiente garante que os recursos são utilizados de forma eficaz, minimizando o desperdício e maximizando a produtividade.

  • Adaptabilidade e Inovação: As boas práticas de gestão permitem que as organizações se adaptem a ambientes em mudança e fomentem a inovação.
